amendment.description: Amendment provides the Department of Defense with final approval over any new land use project that utilizes covered research, development, test and evaluation lands within the continuous United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to provide the Department of Defense with final approval over any new land use project that utilizes covered research, development, test and evaluation lands within the continuous United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Pearce.
